articles.title: AJAX loading of related products in Magento 2
articles.author: Alexander Dite
articles.summary: Introduction In some projects the amount of related products can be significant. In my case there were more than 300 related products and upsell products on some product detail pages. The consequence of this was a high time to first byte on product detail pages. In the mentioned project it was about 15 seconds for some of the products. So we searched for a possible optimization.
